inclusion.criterion: Partial Anterior Circulatory Stroke (PACS) or Transient Ischaemic Attack (TIA)
inclusion.label: not_met
met
inclusion.evidence: carotid U/S showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis

exclusion.criterion: Significant disability or immobility such that participation would cause stress
